faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about SocialFlux
faq.supportText: Our support team is here to help. Reach out anytime.
faq.q1: Do I need an Instagram Business account?
faq.a1: Yes, you'll need an Instagram Business account to connect with SocialFlux. This is required by Instagram's API for security and data access purposes. Converting to a Business account is free and takes just a few minutes.
faq.q2: How often does the feed update?
faq.a2: Your Instagram feed syncs in real-time with SocialFlux. New posts appear on your Shopify store within minutes of being published on Instagram, ensuring your content is always fresh and current.
faq.q3: Can I tag products on posts?
faq.a3: Yes! With our Pro plan, you can tag products directly on Instagram posts. This creates a seamless shopping experience where customers can click on products and add them to their cart without leaving your store.
faq.q4: Is it compatible with my theme?
faq.a4: SocialFlux works with all Shopify themes. We provide a simple block that you can add to any section of your store. If you need custom integration, our support team can help.
faq.q5: What happens if I disconnect Instagram?
faq.a5: If you disconnect your Instagram account, the SocialFlux block will stop displaying content. However, your settings and preferences are saved, so you can reconnect anytime without reconfiguring everything.
faq.q6: Do you store my Instagram data?
faq.a6: We follow strict data privacy practices. We only store the minimum data needed to display your posts on your store. We never sell or share your data, and we're fully GDPR compliant.
faq.a7: Absolutely! You can choose between grid or carousel layouts, adjust the number of posts displayed, customize colors to match your brand, and more. All customization is done through our easy-to-use dashboard.
faq.a8: SocialFlux supports both image and video posts from Instagram. Videos will play directly on your store with autoplay disabled to respect user preferences.

ugc.brandAuthDesc: Authentic customer stories resonate more than polished marketing. Showcase real experiences from real people.

about.title: About SocialFlux
about.intro: SocialFlux is an innovative solution that allows Shopify merchants to easily integrate their Instagram content directly into their online store.
about.mission: We believe in the power of user-generated content (UGC) to build trust and increase conversions. Our mission is to make this integration simple, fast, and effective for all merchants.
about.contactText: For any questions, contact us at

blog.title: The Importance of User-Generated Content (UGC)
blog.intro: User-generated content (UGC) has become an essential element of modern digital marketing. Discover why it's so powerful for your e-commerce.
blog.whatText: UGC refers to any content created by your customers: Instagram photos, reviews, videos, testimonials. It's authentic content that shows your products in real-life situations.
blog.trustText: 92% of consumers trust user-generated content more than traditional advertising. Photos and reviews from real customers create an authentic connection.
blog.conversionText: UGC increases conversion rates by 4.5x compared to traditional product photos. Seeing a product worn or used by real people reassures potential buyers.
blog.socialText: Displaying Instagram content from your satisfied customers creates powerful social proof. It shows that other people love and trust your products.
blog.engagementText: UGC encourages your customers to share their experiences, creating an engaged community around your brand. This generates free and authentic content.
blog.howTitle: How to Integrate UGC on Shopify?
blog.howText: With SocialFlux, easily integrate your customers' Instagram content directly into your Shopify store. Real-time synchronization, complete customization, and guaranteed increase in conversions.
blog.ctaTitle: Ready to harness the power of UGC?
blog.ctaText: Start today with SocialFlux and transform your Instagram content into sales.

cookies.bannerText: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing, you accept our use of cookies.
